summary:
Voyager 1 is a space explorer sent by NASA in 1977 to explore the solar system's outskirts. It's the farthest human-made object from Earth! It visited Jupiter and Saturn, and even Titan, Saturn's big moon. Voyager 1 is now in interstellar space, beyond our sun's reach, making it the first spacecraft to do so.

The probe keeps sending data about space weather and magnetic fields. In 2017, it got a power boost, so its mission is extended. We expect Voyager 1 to keep sending messages until at least 2025, teaching us about the universe's mysteries.
title: Voyager 1
